field.description:
What are KACI-PC-Schedules?
These are time-based blocking schedules specific to Keekar's Parental Control (KACI-PC).
They are separate from pfSense's built-in Schedules in Firewall > Schedules.

Use Cases:
  • Bedtime: Block internet access during sleeping hours (e.g., 22:00-07:00)
  • School Hours: Block access during school time (e.g., 08:00-15:00 on weekdays)
  • Dinner Time: Block during family meals (e.g., 18:00-19:00)
  • Study Time: Block during homework hours
How it works: When a schedule is active, ALL devices in the selected profile are blocked, regardless of whether they have remaining time in their daily limit.
